Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Statuette
Description: A finely worked wooden statuette of the goddess Taweret. She is standing with her left leg forward and both arms straight at the side of her body. She wears a small modius headdress. There are traces of paint on her body and black facial details.Taweret was a household deity most often associated with the protection of women in childbirth.
